ingredients.amount: 1 breast (for about 200 calories WITHOUT the skin)
ingredients.name: chicken

ingredients.amount: Eat the amount you want (1 cup is about 20 calories)
ingredients.name: spinach

name: chicken with rice & spinach
notes: can eat it with some vegetables
steps: put salt, pepper, thyme, onion powder and red pepper on the chicken
spray the pan with the cooking spray and set it on the stove on low.
put the chicken on the pan and wait around 10 minutes and turn it around.
once the chicken is golden and crispy take it out of the pan and put it on a plate and cut it in small pieces.
mix it with the rice and spinach in a bowl and enjoy!

name: french toast
notes: You can also use protein powder for that extra protein intake. You can also add no calorie sugar.
steps: mix vanilla extract, cinnamon and white eggs in a bowl.
soak bread in mix and put in the hot pan.
cook bread until it has a brownish color
eat it with fruit or low calorie light syrup

name: egg sandwich
steps: add the egg in a pot and fill with water until it covers the egg. Let it boil for approximately 11-13 minutes.
after the egg is finished cooking, cut it in little pieces with a spoon.
mix the egg with the light mayo and add the spinach to it.
add the egg mixture into the sandwhich and add the cheese on top and enjoy.
